item.description:
I'm teaching a series of introductory level Photoshop workshops for the BPC. I can sign up anyone from this group who is interested. This would be relevant to anyone looking to get started in digital photo editing.

Workshop fee is $36. Please contact me or email photoshop08@davidk.net if you are interested in attending.

Workshop outline:

- How do photographers use photo editing software?
- Which version of Photoshop do you need?
- Choosing between JPEG and RAW formats
- Scanning negatives, slides, and prints
- Creating contact sheets
- Cropping photographs to a standard print size
- Simple fixes for distortion, color, and contrast
- The importance of backups and file management
- Sharpening filters for enhancing a photo's clarity
- Preparing images for printers and print services
- Preparing images for uploading to the web

group.name: The Boston Digital Arts Meetup Group

item.name: Photoshop 101: The Basics
